description: Our new MSc Hospitality Innovation Management, offered in partnership with Le Cordon Bleu, is a distinctive course drawing on both academic and professional expertise to provide you with the opportunity for personal and professional development.Â You will develop the professional skills required to undertake a wide range of roles in the hospitality industry, including entrepreneurship, hospitality management, leadership and innovation.
